title: Increases the threshold for liability for contributions for unemployment insurance from $300 per calendar quarter to $2000 per calendar quarter
summary: Increases the threshold for liability for contributions for unemployment insurance from $300 per calendar quarter to $2000 per calendar quarter.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3804

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 27, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. WEPRIN -- read once and referred to the Committee
         on Labor

       AN  ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to the terms of coverage for
         unemployment insurance

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  The  opening paragraph of subdivision 1 of section 560 of
    2  the labor law, as amended by chapter 103 of the laws of 1965, is amended
    3  to read as follows:
    4    Any employer shall become liable for contributions under this  article
    5  if  he OR SHE has paid remuneration of [three hundred dollars or more in
    6  any calendar quarter, except that  liability  with  respect  to  persons
    7  employed  in  personal  or  domestic  service  in private homes shall be
    8  considered separately and an employer shall become liable  for  contrib-
    9  utions with respect to such persons only if he has paid to them remuner-
   10  ation  in  cash  of  five  hundred]  TWO THOUSAND dollars or more in any
   11  calendar quarter.  Such liability for contributions  shall  commence  on
   12  the first day of such calendar quarter.
   13    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD05055-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to the terms of coverage for unemployment insurance
